title: Hindustan Composites invests Rs 5.2 crore in Swiggy
description: Hindustan Composites purchased 1.5 lakh shares of Swiggy in the transaction, it added in an exchange filing. With this investment, the company joins a number of other investors who have been picking up stakes in the food delivery and quick commerce major.
content: Automobile materials manufacturer Hindustan Composites Ltd said it has invested Rs 5.17 crore in public markets-bound Swiggy.Hindustan Composites purchased 1.5 lakh shares of Swiggy in the transaction, it added in an exchange filing. With this investment, the company joins a number of other investors who have been picking up stakes in the food delivery and quick commerce major.On August 28, ET reported that actor Amitabh Bachchanâ€™s family office had picked up a stake in Swiggy by purchasing shares from employees and early investors. Raamdeo Agrawal, the chairman of Motilal Oswal Financial Services has also picked up a stake in the Bengaluru-based company.Swiggy has filed documents with the markets regulator for a $1.25-billion initial public offering (IPO).
